post_text: February 14, 2019 at 11:20 PM#1Creating effects grouped by groups is not easy on the grandMA2.If the groups contains different amount of fixtures, then no inbuilt effect property (groups/blocks/wings/interleave) are able to distribute the phase properly to make each group act as if it was one fixture.This macro makes it easier....- Enter amount of groups/steps- Select groups via Group-pool- Select template effect via Effect-pool- Select empty location via Effect-pool- Label the generated selective effect with your keyboard.Please look at the info-text of the macro, and info-text of the macrolines for further instructions and to learn how it works...FilesGGP.xml6.8 kB – 89 Downloads
